ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Someone's pulling my leg! [Karana]
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL I spent way more than 400pp to get 200. I am still in large debt to several people for supporting my tinkering. There are several people who are at 200
ygData.messageBody:
LOL

I spent way more than 400pp to get 200. I am still in large debt to several
people for supporting my tinkering.

There are several people who are at 200 now. Of those people, only two spent
less than 5000pp to get to 200 and neither are gnome wizards.

An interesting note: of the people who are at 200, only one still sells
tinkering items in the game.

-Mauldoon


----- Original Message -----
From: J.Tully <jtully@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2000 5:41 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Someone's pulling my leg! [Karana]


> From: "J.Tully" <jtully@...>
>
> Had an interesting conversation about a week or two ago with a female bard
> on the Karana server by the name of Cleff. She was level 8 or so, and
> claimed to have a level 48 Gnome Wizard with an almost 200 TInkering
Skill.
> This person in particular started publicly (in AUCTION and OOC) berating
me
> for trying to sell Spyglasses for 80pp, or Mechanical Lockpicks for 50pp.
> She stated that another level 50 Gnome Tinkerer on the Karana server was
> selling those items for half that price and I was giving tinkerers a BAD
> NAME. After I started giving the person tells asking why she was trying to
> ruin me financially (which is what she was doing), she gave me a tell back
> saying my prices where ridiculous even for a person trying to recover
costs.
> I was "price gouging" and "trying to rip people off".
>
> Here comes the interesting bit. She claimed to have a primary character
that
> was a level 48 Gnome WIzard, who had an almost 200 Tinkering skill. AND
she
> stated that it only cost her 400PP to get it up to 200 ! ! ! HOW in THE
HELL
> is this ACCOMPLISHED?! Am I the only person who thinks this number is just
> impossible? 400pp barely covers the cost of 2 Aqualungs, much less Cams
and
> Spyglasses etc etc to get the skill 100... much less OVER 100 ! Has anyone
> else run across a person making such FRIVILOUS claims?
>
> She stated that she was best friends with two of the prominent highlevel
> tinkerers on the Server (Knok, and Thinktink), and that THIS mailing list
> was "total bullshit" (and I quote). The mailing list was full of newbie
> geeks who only wanted recipes for tinkering items and wheren't smart
enough
> to look it up on the web.
>
> Please anyone else on Karana who reads this, respond. Let me know if
you've
> met this person also. She/He is give us a REAL bad name.
>
> -Tuni Gearspinner
> 38th Circle Gnome Mage (Karana)
>
>
